## PolyAsyncIterable.tap() method

Return an iteration of the same elements as `this` after calling `func(element)` for all elements.

**Signature:**

```typescript
tap(func: AsyncIndexedRunnable<T>, options?: ConcurrencyOptions): PolyAsyncIterable<T>;
```

</td><td>

</td></tr>

</td><td>

</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Options for concurrency of this operation


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

[PolyAsyncIterable](./polyethylene.polyasynciterable.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt;

A new [PolyAsyncIterable](./polyethylene.polyasynciterable.md) that yields the same elements as `this`
